fiveYearVision:
I'm 29, living in a penthouse in Manhattan or Santa Monica. Net worth north of $10M. Prospector Labs generates $2M+ ARR ‚Äî I have a team of 5-10 running it. I've spoken at major energy conferences. My name comes up when people talk about energy data. I'm in the best shape of my life ‚Äî 210, lean, people ask me what I do. I'm in a relationship with someone incredible who matches my ambition. Mom would be proud. I call my brother every week, see my niece and nephew regularly. I travel when I want, where I want. I wake up excited, not anxious. The scarcity is gone ‚Äî replaced by abundance in every dimension. I built this from nothing, in Brooklyn, with a Mac mini and a vision.

The Ferrari 458 is in the garage. Not because I need it ‚Äî because I earned it.

pillars.title: Business & Wealth
pillars.oneYearVision: Prospector Labs does $30K+/mo. I have 8-10 PE clients on retainer. The API has paying subscribers. I speak at one energy conference. My inbox has inbound leads weekly. I don't think about rent.

quarterlyGoal.title: Close 1 paying client, $5K revenue
quarterlyGoal.reward: Book a weekend trip somewhere you've been wanting to go
quarterlyGoal.punishment: Donate $500 to a cause you don't support

monthlyMilestones.title: Send 1 free risk snapshot to a PE firm

weeklyActions: Send 5 cold emails to PE target list
Follow up on all open conversations (same day)
Check pipeline in Mission Control daily

pillars.title: Body
pillars.oneYearVision: 210 lbs, lean muscle, visible abs, V-taper, clothes fit perfectly. People notice and ask what I do. I feel powerful, confident, and energized every single day.

quarterlyGoal.title: 205 lbs at 13% BF. Zero missed training days. Track macros daily.
quarterlyGoal.reward: Buy one premium clothing item that fits the new physique

monthlyMilestones.title: Set up macro tracking (3,200 cal, 210g protein)

pillars.title: Personal Brand
pillars.oneYearVision: I'm the 'cracked data guy' in energy. 15K+ LinkedIn, 5K+ Twitter. DMs from PE firms and journalists. Content drives inbound weekly. Featured in at least one publication.

quarterlyGoal.title: 4x/week posting for 5 weeks. 5,500 LinkedIn, 1,500 Twitter.
quarterlyGoal.punishment: Write and post 'Why I Failed at Consistency' on LinkedIn

monthlyMilestones.title: Connect with 20 new people/week in energy

pillars.title: Relationships
pillars.oneYearVision: In a relationship with someone incredible. Rich social life. Call brother weekly. Visit sister quarterly. Sexual confidence fully resolved. Fully present with people.

currentReality.social: Many friends, not social enough lately
currentReality.family: Close with Mitchell, need more contact with sister

quarterlyGoal.title: 4+ dates in March. Call brother weekly. Start sexual confidence plan.
quarterlyGoal.reward: Plan a trip to visit brother in Utah
quarterlyGoal.punishment: Admit to Harry you've been avoiding dating

weeklyActions: 1 date or social interaction with a girl

pillars.title: Mind & Growth
pillars.oneYearVision: Calm, focused mind. Avoidance conquered. Read 2 books/month. Journal daily. Meditate daily. Deep energy knowledge. Scarcity mindset gone.

quarterlyGoal.title: 30-day zero-open-loops streak. Meditate daily. Read 2 books.
quarterlyGoal.reward: Buy one course or coaching session
quarterlyGoal.punishment: No social media consumption for 1 week

monthlyMilestones.title: 30-day streak: zero open loops at EOD

weeklyActions: Clear all open loops before bed

pillars.title: Financial Foundation
pillars.oneYearVision: $200K+ saved beyond IRA. $30K/mo income. Expenses at $4K. Invest regularly. Never think about affording lunch.

quarterlyGoal.title: Reduce burn to $4K. Generate $5K revenue. Don't touch IRA.
